title: Companion Approval Guide
content: rina need to be freed by Ethel or Ethel being dead Require picking up the Second Marriage Wand in Ethel's loot room Gale +Karlach + Wyll + None Mayrina Sunlit Wetlands - Next to the Teahouse and in Front of Connor's Casket. If you use the Mushroom Portal, impossible to miss.
